policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="initialize"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="will be overwritten in case of an error"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Validation location"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Set the location to access the validation implementation"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZmFsc2U="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="isLocal"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="content-type"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Custom data passed to JWT generation"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="aWRfdG9rZW4="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="response_type"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="7e2b4f64-e226-4a03-980a-c4603163acc0"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK OVP Configuration"/>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Generate id_token locally | "/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${host_oauth_ovp_server}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item regex="included">
                            <L7p:Pattern stringValue="http[s]?://(localhost|127[.]0[.]0[.]1).+"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="DB location"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Set the location to access the database"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dHJ1ZQ=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="isLocal"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="290511a8-b775-47a7-98ab-7be386da2105"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Client GET"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="client_ident"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="client_key"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${client_key}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="environment"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="filterStatus"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="format"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="master"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="name"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="operation"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="getKey"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="org"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="queryOffset"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="0"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="registered_by"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathSecret"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns:values/ns:value/ns:secret/text()"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-clientstore"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="4eea3ccc-feaf-4ba7-9c92-48f06db76d62"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK id_token Generation"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="access_token"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${access_token}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="acr"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${acr}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="authTime"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${authTime}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="azp"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${azp}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="client_id"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${client_key}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="code"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${custom}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="id_token_signed_response_alg"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${id_token_signed_response_alg}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="nonce"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${nonce}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="resource"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${resource}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="resource_owner"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${resource_owner}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="response_type"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${response_type}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="salt"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${salt}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="shared_secret"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${xpathSecret.result}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="state"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${state}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="subject_type"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${subject_type}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="third_party_sso_token"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${third_party_sso_token}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="third_party_sso_token_type"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${third_party_sso_token_type}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="0074476e-2de7-4c63-bad3-ef658035dce9"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK id_token Persist"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="azp"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${client_key}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="iss"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${iss}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="jwt"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="resource_owner"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${resource_owner}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="salt"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${salt}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="shared_secret"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${shared_secret}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="shared_secret_type"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${alg}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="sub"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${sub}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="generated_sso_token_type"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="generated_sso_token_type"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dGV4dC94bWw7Y2hhcnNldD1VVEYtOA=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="content-type"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="PHZhbGlkYXRpb24geG1sbnM9Imh0dHA6Ly9ucy5sN3RlY2guY29tLzIwMTIvMTEvb3RrLW92cCI+DQogPHJlc3VsdD52YWxpZDwvcmVzdWx0Pg0KIDxqd3Q+JHtqd3R9PC9qd3Q+DQogPGlkX3Rva2VuX3R5cGU+JHtnZW5lcmF0ZWRfc3NvX3Rva2VuX3R5cGV9PC9pZF90b2tlbl90eXBlPg0KPC92YWxpZGF0aW9uPg=="/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml;charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="resp"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_mode}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="form_post"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="form_post"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ICA8Zm9ybSBtZXRob2Q9InBvc3QiIGFjdGlvbj0iJHtyZWRpcmVjdF91cml9Ij4NCiAgICA8aW5wdXQgdHlwZT0iaGlkZGVuIiBuYW1lPSJpZF90b2tlbiINCiAgICAgdmFsdWU9IiR7and0fSIvPg0KICAgIDxpbnB1dCB0eXBlPSJoaWRkZW4iIG5hbWU9ImlkX3Rva2VuX3R5cGUiDQogICAgIHZhbHVlPSIke2dlbmVyYXRlZF9zc29fdG9rZW5fdHlwZX0iLz4="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="formResp"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="form_post"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZWRpcmVjdF91cml9I2lkX3Rva2VuPSR7and0fSZpZF90b2tlbl90eXBlPSR7Z2VuZXJhdGVkX3Nzb190b2tlbl90eXBlfQ=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="location"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ImlkX3Rva2VuIjogIiR7and0fSIsDQoiaWRfdG9rZW5fdHlwZSI6ICIke2dlbmVyYXRlZF9zc29fdG9rZW5fdHlwZX0i"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwtResp"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="set responses"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="local"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${isLocal}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="client_key"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="client_keyEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="resource_owner"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="resource_ownerEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="azp"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="azpEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="nonce"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="nonceEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="salt"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="saltEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="third_party_sso_token"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="third_party_sso_tokenEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="third_party_sso_token_type"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="third_party_sso_token_typeEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="acr"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="acrEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="authTime"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="authTimeEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="custom"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="customEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="state"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="state"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="response_type"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="response_type"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="idtokenmessage"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="no-fail"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="always succeed"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:CurrentSecurityHeaderHandling intValue="3"/>
                    <L7p:FailOnErrorStatus booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:PassThroughSoapFaults booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="${host_oauth_ovp_server}/oauth/validation/validate/v2/idtoken"/>
                    <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                    </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
                    <L7p:RequestMsgSrc stringValue="idtokenmessage"/>
                    <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                    </L7p:RequestParamRules>
                    <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                    </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
                    <L7p:ResponseMsgDest stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
                </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwLmh0dHAuaGVhZGVyLngtY2EtZXJyfQ=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="500"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="LT"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="LT"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="500"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                        <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="routing failed!"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="error code"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="set error code to 000"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MDAw"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="routing errors"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:Regex>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="capture"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="capture the last 3 digits"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="error.code"/>
                            <L7p:Regex stringValue="(\d{0,16})(\d{3})$"/>
                            <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Replacement stringValue="$2"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                        </L7p:Regex>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="error.code"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathJwt"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns:validation[ns:result='valid']/ns:jwt/text()"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-ovp"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathIdTokenType"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns:validation[ns:result='valid']/ns:id_token_type/text()"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-ovp"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_mode}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="form_post"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="form_post"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ICA8Zm9ybSBtZXRob2Q9InBvc3QiIGFjdGlvbj0iJHtyZWRpcmVjdF91cml9Ij4NCiAgICA8aW5wdXQgdHlwZT0iaGlkZGVuIiBuYW1lPSJpZF90b2tlbiINCiAgICAgdmFsdWU9IiR7eHBhdGhKd3QucmVzdWx0fSIvPg0KICAgIDxpbnB1dCB0eXBlPSJoaWRkZW4iIG5hbWU9ImlkX3Rva2VuX3R5cGUiDQogICAgIHZhbHVlPSIke3hwYXRoSWRUb2tlblR5cGUucmVzdWx0fSIvPg=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="formResp"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="form_post"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZWRpcmVjdF91cml9I2lkX3Rva2VuPSR7eHBhdGhKd3QucmVzdWx0fSZpZF90b2tlbl90eXBlPSR7eHBhdGhJZFRva2VuVHlwZS5yZXN1bHR9"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="location"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ImlkX3Rva2VuIjogIiR7eHBhdGhKd3QucmVzdWx0fSIsDQoiaWRfdG9rZW5fdHlwZSI6ICIke3hwYXRoSWRUb2tlblR5cGUucmVzdWx0fSI="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwtResp"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="set responses"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="remote"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Access was granted: response_type=id_token"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// Generate ID_Token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
